summary: Adds a new Shadowscale follower in a new house with full crafting stations, a double bed, a chest, and even a fun boss.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION:
Adds a new house located in the Dwarven Storeroom, a building next to Mzulft, and cell Mzulft04z. This house comes equipped with a dark blue Argonian Shadowscale follower that is in full DB armor,   has an ebony sword in his right hand and knows the Fast Healing spell, as well as Chain Lighting. It\'s furnished with a chest, with a bed, with a eight seated table with plates and silverware to match the Dwarven theme, with every crafting station available, and a few enchanted items as well as some filled black soul gems on the enchanting table to give a little boost, and even a Falmer boss.

[color=blue]VERSION INFO:
1.0
-adds He-Who-Slays-From-Shadows
-adds house
-adds Aghbech The Unholy[/color]

[color=red]KNOWN BUGS:
-NPCs might not appear[/color]
author: RAK
